value.title: Roboflow and Ultralytics, Creator of YOLOv5, Partner to Streamline Custom Computer Vision Model Development
value.excerpt: Roboflow, an end-to-end computer vision developer platform, and Ultralytics, the creators of the popular open source YOLOv5 model, have partnered to launch a streamlined way to prepare, label, and train computer vision models on custom datasets with an emphasis on active learning.
